channel.title: Simd on Gazoo.vrv
channel.description: Recent content in Simd on Gazoo.vrv

item.title: Very Fast, High-Precision SIMD/GPU Gradient Noise
item.description: A recently published article by Inigo Quilez on Voronoi Edges highlights the technique of shifting the co-ordinate frame of procedural algorithms to improve precision. This is a really important little trick that I felt was worth reviewing, as it provides huge benefits to world generation at a planetary scale.
